My new lenses for my G3 arrived today. I’ve bought a 2x telephoto lens (Kenko KNT 20) and a 0.72x wideangle lens (Raynox DCR 720), as well as a couple of Kenko lens adapters from The Filter Connection. Shame I haven’t got a G3 to put them on at the moment :-(, but hopefully it will be back at the end of the week.
